title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.14 - Officer vacancies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.14 - Officer vacancies

State Regulations

Vacancies shall occur in the position of student assembly
officer upon the death, recall by the student assembly, resignation, incapacity
as determined by the student assembly, loss of member status, loss of
eligibility to serve as a representative, or loss of student status by the
incumbent. Officer vacancies may be filled for the remaining portion of the
unexpired term of office through an election at the next meeting of the student
assembly or according to alternate bylaw procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
341.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
